data.subTitle: 流式布局
data.content:
每行的项目数固定，会自动分行。查看Demo

CSS的写法。


.parent {
  width: 200px;
  height: 150px;
  background-color: black;
  display: flex;
  flex-flow: row wrap;
  align-content: flex-start;
}

.child {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  background-color: white;
  flex: 0 0 25%;
  height: 50px;
  border: 1px solid red;
}
